attributes.action: Ask courts to rule on historic sex abuse cases in Westminster in the inquiry
attributes.additional_details: Here's an article on the subject including the quote:https://www.holyrood.com/articles/news/uk-historic-sex-abuse-inquiry-will-not-rule-politicians
attributes.background: The inquiry will not look at specific cases as lawyer Andrew O’Connor, QC states public concern is “diminished considerably”. If this petition receives many signatures it is irrefutable proof that his statement is incorrect and the inquiry should rule on specific cases - the public is concerned

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

The Independent Inquiry into Child Sexual Abuse (IICSA) is independent of the UK Government and Parliament. 

You can find out more here:

https://www.iicsa.org.uk/about-us
